what_to_watch: Three separate canopy structures: Face-to-Face (F2F), Order My Dish (OMD), Patio
Each has its own set: Footing locations, footings, framing plan, sections, elevations, light layout
Structural connections between canopy and main building
Footing dimensions and anchor bolt patterns
Canopy framing member sizes â€” steel sections, spans
Light layout coordination with electrical plans
common_superintendent_questions: What are the footing sizes for the patio canopy?
How does the F2F canopy connect to the building?
What's the steel section for the OMD canopy beams?
Where are the canopy lights and what circuits do they feed from?
learned: OMD stands for Order Meal Delivery (not Order My Dish). Use this meaning when interpreting canopy sheet prefixes and labels.
